alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pierce, east central Bacon, northern Wayne and southeastern Appling Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Odum, or 10 miles south of Surrency, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Odum and Doctortown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
